**About liveinhost.com**

Liveinhost is a privately-owned company founded in year 2015 and located in India. Our Resellers ensure that your clients websites up securely and easily. All our Resellers come with Anti-DDoS protection, Free Dedicated IP, Free unlimited SSL certificates and daily backups. We consider every one of our customers to be a part of our family.Our goal is to provide outstanding services for the best possible price. When you are with our service you can rest assured that whatever solution you purchase from us, is using 100% top of the range, high end hardware to accomplish your required needs.

`PayPal is only accepted payment method.`

FAQ: Q: Do you offer Softaculous? A: Yes, it is available.

Q: What is your average setup time? A: Instant Activation.

Q: How long have you been in business? A: Since 2015.

Q: DC location? A: France

Q: Do you allow proxy sites? A: We allow private proxy sites. We do not permit public proxy sites.

Q: Do you make backups of all websites? A: Yes, with Liveinhost we maintain backups. We do, however, always recommend keeping your own backups in addition to ours.

Q: Can you assist transferring our existing data? A: Yes, in most cases we can transfer your existing data to your cPanel account from another provider for free.

**www.liveinhost.com**
